about_the_game:
Craft Your Robots

Assemble your robots and rovers by combining various blocks and parts. Mix and match - make your own constructions. They are your best tools and only friends out there - take care of them and they'll take care of you.
Craft new parts and upgrade to make the best machines for succeeding in your mission of setting up the base on the foreign planet.

Manage Your Units

Maintain your machines in good condition, keep them fully charged and don't let them overheat! You have to balance multiple parameters while building your robots - like a true engineer. Specialize your constructions or create multipurpose machines to mine, gather, transport, process the resources and defend your units.


Build The Base

Build the safe haven for your bots. Establish the base with charging stations, garages, workshops, forges and anything that your metal friends might need to operate. Create a command center to manage the work of your machines from which you'll expand the colonization of the planet.

Automate Your Machines

Streamline your operations by automating robots - plan and program optimal job sequences and watch them obey your orders!

Explore And Research

Walk, drive, hover or fly to explore nooks and crannies of the foreign land. Adapt your machines to the terrain conditions for their best performance. Perform planetary research, gather the data and develop necessery technology to succeed in your mission.
